title: Highest Point within 1/2 Mile
description: Find the highest point within a 1 mile radius of your current location and take a photo.

title: Hidden Passageway
description: Discover a hidden passageway or alley within a 2 mile radius of your current location.

title: Follow the Stream
description: Find a stream or river within a 3 mile radius and follow it for at least 1 mile
